environment-setup.title: Environment Setup for Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
environment-setup.description: This guide will help you set up the development environment needed to work through the examples in this book. The setup involves installing ROS 2, simulation environments, and AI frameworks.

intro.title: Introduction to Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics
intro.description: Welcome to the Physical AI & Humanoid Robotics Hackathon Book! This comprehensive guide will take you through the fundamentals of controlling humanoid robots using artificial intelligence in both simulated and real-world environments. This expanded edition now covers 12 comprehensive chapters to provide a complete understanding of humanoid robotics.

practice-tasks-ros2.title: Practice Tasks: ROS 2 Fundamentals
practice-tasks-ros2.description: Complete these hands-on exercises to reinforce your understanding of ROS 2 fundamentals.

practice-tasks-simulation.title: Practice Tasks: Simulation Concepts
practice-tasks-simulation.description: Complete these hands-on exercises to reinforce your understanding of simulation concepts for humanoid robots.
